title: 🌴 Come Tour our Renovated 2br at Solera Apartment Community 🌴
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Our large one and two bedroom floor plans include spacious fully-equipped kitchens with breakfast nooks, large closets with linen space, private patios and decks, and ceiling fans.
Select apartment homes come with a private backyard and upgraded interior finishes.
Residents at Solera can enjoy the convenience of the community swimming pool, laundry care center, and their own assigned parking spot.
Adding to all our great amenities is our location—just minutes from Santana Row, Valley Fair, and the greenest parks in the county.
Dogs and Cats Allowed: Residents are allowed a maximum of two pets per apartment.
A one-time security deposit and monthly rent fee of $75 for each dog and $50 for each cat.
The security deposit for the first pet is $500 per pet.
Please see a Leasing Associate for breed and weight restrictions.•$500 Deposit•$150
